name: Crumbling Construction, Inc.
description:
A physically accurate simulation of the illegal development industry!

Enjoy the feeling of entering the construction industry as Mr Calcestruzzi, a wealthy and ambitious tycoon whose business model is based on cutting the costs of safety regulations and human empathy. Become the King of the Cranes by selling shaky coastal houses to your fellow citizens and unexpectedly shortening their lifespan. Exceed in mortar toppings and package your unstable buildings with fancy rooftiles.

This game was made for the Nordic Game Jam 2017 by artists Daniela Arienti & Erika Inzitari and developers (in the software sense) Luca Contato, Renato Kuurstra & Mauro Vanetti.
